statements.select: select * from ProduceOtherMaterialDetail where ProduceOtherMaterialId=#value# order by Inumber

SELECT b.* FROM Product a RIGHT JOIN ProduceOtherMaterialDetail b ON a.productid=b.productid LEFT JOIN ProductCategory c ON a.ProductCategoryId=c.ProductCategoryId where b.ProduceOtherMaterialId=#value# ORDER BY c.Id

select * from ProduceOtherMaterialDetail where ProduceOtherMaterialId in (select ProduceOtherMaterialId from ProduceOtherMaterial where (WorkHouseId=#houseid# or #houseid# is null) and ProduceOtherMaterialDate between #startDate# and #enddate#)

SELECT * FROM ProduceOtherMaterialDetail WHERE ProduceOtherMaterialId=#ProduceOtherMaterialId# AND ProductId IN (SELECT ProductId FROM Product WHERE (Id>=#productId1# OR #productId1# IS NULL) AND (Id<=#productId2# OR #productId2# IS NULL))
select * from ProduceOtherMaterialDetail where ProduceOtherMaterialId=#ProduceOtherMaterialId# and (DepotOutStateDetail<>2 or DepotOutStateDetail is null)
SELECT * FROM ProduceOtherMaterialDetail WHERE ProductId=#productId# AND ProduceOtherMaterialId=#ProduceOtherMaterialId# AND DepotPositionId=#depotPositionId#
select * from ProduceOtherMaterialDetail where ProductId=#productid# and ProduceOtherMaterialId in (select ProduceOtherMaterialId from ProduceOtherMaterial where InsertTime>#InsertTime#)
